name: Hell's Playground
description:
Welcome to hell's playground. Only the most courageous demons fight here.

Controls are wasd & arrow keys.

While there is a single player option, the best way to experience this game is with 2 players.

This game is for Mini Jam 77. The theme was Courage which was why I made it an arena battle. The limitation was 'Can't be set on Earth', so it's set in hell.

Have fun.
